courierServices.baseClasses

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • courierServices.baseClasses.Order
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class representing a single order. This class also implements Serializable interface for writing object to file.
    Author:
    Shubham Kumar
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
